title: Keep It Simple
description: Simplify an overcomplicated function that checks if a number is even
solution:
# Simplified using KISS principle
def is_even(number):
    return number % 2 == 0

# Test your simplified function
print(is_even(4))
print(is_even(7))
print(is_even(0))
hints: The modulo operation already returns a boolean comparison
No need for if-else when you can return the comparison directly
